data.description:
# Hammer Heads is a pack of chaotically fun VR multiplayer games. 

Escape, Race, Defend, Survive, Co-Op - you can do it all with players from around the world.

Hammer Heads has **unique and simplified locomotion** which makes all games more enjoyable just like you are doing it all in real!!  
You can walk, Jog or Run freely without any buttons and joystick ğŸš¶â€â™‚ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸

There are hammers for extra fun! ğŸ¤¯ğŸ”¨ 

You can play these games:

# Sky Park ğŸˆğŸ§—â€â™‚ï¸ğŸª

An elevated structure where you can hangout, climb, fly, race, engage in blaster battles, or do whatever you want. 
This game offers you the freedom to explore and play, with many challenging rewards to collect.

{758726772714938}

# Maze Out ğŸ‘¹ğŸ¤¯

Survive in the maze full of monsters. Either you can find a key to escape or play mischief on other players. 
There is always a loot available in a maze.

{452608070564989}

# Flog of Honor ğŸ³ï¸ ğŸ’£

Protect the flag of honor from attacking bombs at any cost. 
This high intensity game is all about going wild. Co-Op mode is the only way to save the flag.
You can compete on the scoreboard with your friends.

{1106201633989177}

More games are coming very soon!!

# Flex Your Looks ğŸ¤ â˜ ï¸ğŸ¤¡ğŸ˜ğŸ©ğŸ‘‘

Never forget to look cool and attractive in Hammer Heads! 
There are ~70 attractive and animated cosmetics. Choose from over 500+ cosmetic combinations to truly flex your style!


Join Hammer Heads community - https://discord.gg/YYba9rb9n4

Watch out your head in the game, always!
